question: Which Policy aims to use drones to fly alongside manned aircrafts ?
option1: National Unmanned Aircraft Traffic Management Policy
answer: National Unmanned Aircraft Traffic Management Policy
explanation: The draft National Unmanned Aircraft Traffic Management Policy aims to use drones to fly alongside manned aircrafts . The proposed policy comes in the backdrop of several instances shutting down of airportsâ€™ operations soon after the sighting of drones. The policy aims to integrate drone operations in current Air Traffic Management System while ensuring maintenance of high levels of aviation safety.
